snippet.title: Aikatsu Friends Arcade (Aikatsu Museum) : STARDOM
snippet.description:
I have been listening to this song a lot lately and it prompted me to want to make a new video with some of my favorite Sugar Melody coords. Old songs are still accessible though Aikatsu Museum although, true to Aikatsu Stars era, you still can't put an accessory on a teammate. I never understood that. 

I live in Japan and play idol games. Read about my adventures:
Pretty Series (Pretty Rhythm/PriPara/PriChan) blog: https://pretty-idol-hell.tumblr.com/
Main Blog (often you'll find posts about Aikatsu and King of Prism): https://lunawings.tumblr.com/
Prism Rush (King of Prism mobile game) translations: https://prism-rush.tumblr.com/
This video is of an arcade game. It is not an app. It is a physical game you play by putting money in an arcade cabinet. 
If you are wondering how I recorded this video, some arcades in Japan have (unofficial) video capture machines.
